name: BALD
description:
Do we really need a description? Well I guess if I had to sell you into this it would be nice to mention that flames come out of your head so yeah, you bald now. Also, you feel very sleepy all the time which is nice. The sun is also very shinny. I'm also trying to write too many keynotes to fill an empty space. Why are you still here? Are you waiting for some catch at the end of this? Well there might. Nah I'm lying there is nothing. Actually this thing is on repeat for like 3 paragraphs, but on a different order so it might seem like you still got something to read. Damn I just spoiled the trick. Meh, whatever. Meh, whatever. More. The sun is also very shinny. I'm also trying to write too many keynotes to fill an empty space. Why are you still here? Are you waiting for some catch at the end of this? Well there might. Nah I'm lying there is nothing. Actually this thing is on repeat for like 3 paragraphs, but on a different order so it might seem like you still got something to read. Damn I just spoiled the trick. Meh, whatever.

Credits: 

Created by Ian Ahmed Kläre Fernandez  & Veronica Kwok

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences Berlin.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
